B.2.2. Symphysis-fundal height (SFH) measurement• What methods are being used for fetal growth and gestational age (GA) assessment • Continue to include GA assessment and fetal growth assessment (by SFH or clinical palpation) in ANC contacts and documentation• N /A • No proven benefit to switching to fundal height measurement in settings where not currently in place.
